Aashram Pure Vegetarian Restaurant in Nuvem, Goa, is a paradise for those seeking delicious, wholesome vegetarian food ‚úÖ
Each prepared with fresh ingredients and authentic spices. Every bite feels like a burst of taste, with the perfect balance of flavors that leaves you wanting more üòã

A special mention to the chef, whose culinary skills are impeccable, bringing out the best in vegetarian cuisine. The owner deserves high praise as well for creating such a warm and welcoming ambiance. üôåüèº

We had breakfast and lunch on consecutive days at Aashram Pure Vegetarian Restaurant, located on NH 66, while traveling from Varca to central and North Goa. Given the scarcity of eateries along this highway, it‚Äôs a convenient and valuable stop for travelers.

Finding a good place right on the highway with ample parking was a relief. The restaurant is clean and offers a wide variety of food items at reasonable prices.

For lunch, we ordered Dal Khichdi, which was served piping hot and fresh‚Äîit was delicious. We also tried the mini Thali, which was quite good. For breakfast the previous day, we had Dosa and Poori Bhaji‚Äîboth were tasty and enjoyable.

Overall, Aashram Pure Vegetarian Restaurant is a reliable dining option for travelers on NH 66, offering tasty and reasonably priced meals in a clean and accessible setting.

Just adjacent to highway . Food, service and people everyone is really warm here.
Plus the authenticity of taste is maintained
